column4: Hi, I want to create and maintaine new iso which will be a mixture of ubuntu-maverick and some packages in main ubuntu repo + local ppa. I have a idea about seeds, but not other things completely
Wish, if someone can provide me pointers and resources :-)
remastersys was designed for such things
I am not sure, but we can't use remasterysys for creating iso on remote vm or local vm.. right?
